en-us.notice: After login, more functions will be unlocked.
en-us.maxRetryPre: Exceed the maximum number of errors, please try again after
en-us.errInfo: Login failed, email or password is wrong!
en-us.codeSendSucInfo: Verification code has been sent to your email. If you can not find the email, please check the spam box.
en-us.codeSendFailInfo: Email does not exist, please check again or register a new account.
en-us.resetPassFailInfo: Reset password failed, Please try again or contact opengms@njnu.edu.cn
en-us.userNotExist: User with this email does not exists
en-us.resetPassFail: Failed to reset password, please try again later

zh-cn.notice: 登录后即可解锁更多功能
zh-cn.errInfo: 登录失败，邮箱或密码错误！
zh-cn.codeSendSucInfo: 验证码已发送至您的邮箱。若您未收到邮件，请检查邮箱回收站。
zh-cn.codeSendFailInfo: 邮箱不存在，请重新检查或注册一个新帐户。
zh-cn.resetPassFailInfo: 密码重置失败，请重试或发送邮件至opengms@njnu.edu.cn
zh-cn.userNotExist: 未找到使用此邮箱的用户
zh-cn.resetPassFail: 密码重置失败，请稍后重试
